Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities

Class SoundEffect

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities.SoundEffect
public class SoundEffect extends Object
The Class handles the sound effect of the game and has been transferred to utilize the JAVAFX AudioClip.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916
